channel.title: Cannot find main class: jframe, program will exit will REP++
channel.description: The title explains and yes the client has the correct path to find jframe and my client works for me and several others but for some people it does not :L. Here is my run... [code]@echo off title DXPK Client cd Gian java -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 pause[/code] Thanks, Will REP ++ if you get it to work

item.title: Cannot find main class: jframe, program will exit will REP++
item.dc:creator: @defer48 defer48
item.description:
@defer48 wrote:

[quote=“ethanhello, post:2, topic:433980”]Do you have the file named JFrame.java?

If not try this

@echo off title DXPK Client cd Gian java -Xmx300m GUI 10 0 highmem members 32 pause

Or

@echo off title DXPK Client cd Gian java -Xmx300m client 10 0 highmem members 32 pause[/quote]
I do have a Jframe.

Read full topic
item.source: Cannot find main class: jframe, program will exit will REP++
